thread.title: OSU's Meyer recaps Maryland, previews Penn State

title: OSU's Meyer recaps Maryland, previews Penn State
text:
OSU's Meyer recaps Maryland, previews Penn State 
Updated: Mon, Oct 12 2015, 03:40 PM 
COLUMBUS (WKRC) -- Top-ranked Ohio State seeks a 20th consecutive victory when it takes on Penn State Saturday. The Buckeyes have won three consecutive games against the Nittany Lions and own a three-game edge, 16-13, in a series that dates to 1912.Ohio State has won 26 Big Ten regular season games in a row, going 8-0 in each of the past three seasons and 2-0 this year. The streak is a Big Ten record. OSU leads the Big Ten in scoring (36.8), rushing (230.0) and total offense (460.0).Buckeyes head coach Urban Meyer met with the media to discuss the matchup on Saturday. He also looked back on the 49-28 win against Maryland. Related Stories Entertainment News
